盒外

Life of Browser Sessions

26 Apr 2010 by

Based on Mozilla Labs Test Pilot data using R and ggplot2. There was a long tail cut from the whole graph, though it’s already interesting to see people keep their browser open for 10+ hours. This is how much this single piece of software weighs in everyone’s daily life now.

More on this to come.
